oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Increased production and closer relationships between organic and inherent qualities of organic food
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Food systems
Soil
Farming Systems
Knowledge management
Crop husbandry
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Goals of DARCOF II The remit of DARCOF II is to produce knowledge that can support increased production and a closer relationship between the inherent and organic qualities of organic foods. The objectives are to provide information on:
1. Effective and rational organic production methods 2. Inherent quality 3. Organic quality The projects are divided into six main areas:
I. Plant production II. Animal Production III. Agriculture and society IV. Research facilities and workshop sites V. Coordination, synergy and education VI. Seed production and development
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Programme} DARCOF II: Increased production and closer relationships between organic and inherent qualities of organic food. Runs 2000 - 2005. Programme Leader(s): Kristensen, Head of centre Erik Steen.
